name: KAO the Kangaroo 3: Mystery of Volcano
name_original: KAO the Kangaroo 3: Mystery of Volcano
description:
KAO the Kangaroo 3: Mystery of Volcano is an arcade game developed by Tate Interactive. It came out on 01-12-2005. It was published by Cenega Publishing. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play KAO the Kangaroo 3: Mystery of Volcano on PC.
